title: Corsair Quinn Eyepatch
body:
After looking at her in-game skin and her splash art, I have come to a conclusion. The eye patch in-game is on the right eye. The eye patch in the splash art is on the left eye.

Edit: Actually, everything on lolking.net is a mirror image of her splash art. I don't know whether it looks that way in-game or not, but everything is on the wrong side.

Edit to my edit: I just looked at her other skins. They all have her holding the crossbow in her left hand, so it's just the splash art that is wrong.

replies.body:
Quinn splash is flipped so that her image isn't block by the stats on the game page. 

This is the actual splash: 

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Aatrox_3.jpg


Edit: They did the same thing with Pool Party Zac

The Pool Party splash is this: http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/DrMundo_8.jpg

But for Zac, it is flipped: http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Zac_2.jpg
Oh, cool. Thanks for telling me. That makes sense.
Yup! This is correct. It's actually not uncommon to see splash art flipped for a better composition in the Champion Details Page. :]
Oddly enough in Aatrox's Sea Hunter splash art the eye patch is on her right eye.

Her in-game skin has her spiky ponytail high up on the back of her head. I think it would look a lot better if it was slightly lower, so it wasn't sticking up like a porcupine on her head. She has nice hair in the splash art, though.
